name: Xelora Prime
desc: Xelora leads the Galactic Syndicate with a vision forged in the asteroid belts of Nebulon-5. With over 300 space cycles of interstellar strategy, she ensures the fleet is always one light-year ahead.

name: Zarnok Mech
desc: Zarnok is the tech brain behind our cosmic engines. A binary-native from the Cypher Quadrant, he's built scalable AI systems used in over 9 galaxies. Rumor says he dreams in code.

name: Lyra Flux
desc: Lyra crafts the visual language of our universe. Known for her stellar design instincts and nebula-inspired palettes, she shapes the emotional core of our brand across dimensions.

name: Krog Zenth
desc: Krog is a marketing warlord from Saturn's second moon. With data tentacles in every quadrant, he launches campaigns that penetrate wormholes and resonate across realities.
